data.title: October 2, 2009 Dear Senator: With unemployment on ... - MoveOn.org
data.meta_description: October 2, 2009 Dear Senator: With unemployment on ... - MoveOn.org
data.text: ong>Octoberong> 2, ong>2009ong> ong>Dearong> ong>Senatorong>: ong>Withong> ong>unemploymentong> on the rise, Americans need Congress to act now to pass President Obama's clean energy jobs plan. According to an independent analysis by the Political Economy Research Institute and the Center for American Progress, President Obama’s plan would create more than 1.7 million jobs. That’s because clean energy sources like wind and solar power create two to three times more jobs than old, dirty sources of energy like coal. Now is the time to put these solutions to work. Below is a petition signed by your constituents. The petition statement reads as follows: ong>Withong> so many still hurting, Congress needs to act now and pass President Obama's clean energy jobs plan. We will gladly provide you with electronic data access to respond to signers at your request, and we thank you for your consideration. For more information contact Steven Biel, Clean Energy Campaign Director, steven.biel@moveon.org, 202-546-0789. Sincerely,
